nodes.text: Ploob was a monster employed at Horville's Hut of Horrors. He looked like a small green ball with a long tube-like nose and hair along his spine.
In the Ewoks episode "Horville's Hut of Horrors," Ploob only appeared for a short time while Horville was talking to Wicket Wystri Warrick and in Wicket's dream.
